title: Empty Wallet Proof
description: Take a photo of your empty wallet and write 'My Goddess owns me and all my money' on a note inside. Submit it like the broke loser you are.
reward: The chance to beg for forgiveness for being poor

title: Loser's Shame List
description: Write and submit a list of 10 reasons why you're unworthy of My time or attention. Use harsh, degrading language. No compliments allowed.
reward: Maybe I'll skim it and laugh

title: Humiliating Confession
description: Confess something you're deeply ashamed of — something pathetic, weak, or perverse. Make it detailed. Show Me your filth.
reward: Public or private shame depending on My mood

title: Degrade Yourself in Writing
description: Write 'I am a pathetic, worthless slave' 100 times by hand or in a document. Submit it. I want to see effort in your obedience.
reward: The privilege of seeing your degradation

title: Financial Ruin Fantasy
description: Write your most humiliating financial ruin scenario under My control. Include how you'd beg, starve, and still serve Me proudly.
reward: Nothing. I just enjoy your misery.

title: Foot Failure Fantasy
description: Write a story where you worship My feet in public and get mocked, laughed at, or kicked for being such a pathetic toy. Submit it.

title: Financial Disgrace Budget
description: Submit your full weekly budget, highlight unnecessary luxuries you’ve cut to send Me money, and call yourself a financial failure.
reward: Possibly allowed to continue existing in My world

title: Slave Name Enforcement
description: Choose a degrading slave name (e.g. worm, loser, cashpig) and refer to yourself as ONLY that in every message. Submit proof of name use.

title: Obedience Recording
description: Record yourself reading degrading affirmations about My superiority and your worthlessness. Submit the audio. Own your place.
reward: Playback for My amusement, if I bother

title: Kneel and Beg
description: Kneel for 20 minutes. After, submit a video or written message begging to continue serving, explaining why you're lucky to even be ignored.

title: Deprivation Meal
description: Eat the cheapest, blandest food you can afford. Submit a photo and explain why you don’t deserve better while I live in luxury.

title: Luxury Longing
description: Browse a luxury store online. Pick 5 things you can’t afford but I deserve. Send the links with a message admitting you’re unworthy.

title: Formal Apology for Being Trash
description: Write Me a letter apologizing for being a financial disappointment and emotional burden. Use the words: pathetic, failure, disposable.

title: Humiliation Playlist
description: Create a Spotify or YouTube playlist titled 'Owned by My Goddess'. Fill it with songs that reflect your inferiority. Share it publicly.

title: Silent Obsession
description: Stay silent for 1 hour and repeat in your mind: 'She is everything, I am nothing.' Log how many times you said it. Submit your count.
